song.englishname: Angels From The Realms Of Glory

english.segment1: Angels from the realms of glory, Wing your flight o'er all the earth;. Ye who sang creation's story. Now proclaim Messiah's birth
english.segment2: Shepherds, in the field abiding, Watching o'er your flocks by night, God with us is now residing;. Yonder shines the infant light
english.segment3: Come and worship, come and worship, Come and worship, Christ the newborn king. Come and worship, come and worship, Come and worship, Christ the newborn king.
english.segment4: Sinners, wrung with true repentance, Doomed for guilt to endless pains, Justice now revokes the sentence, Mercy calls you, break your chains
english.segment5: Come and worship, come and worship, Come and worship, Christ the newborn king. Come and worship, come and worship, Come and worship, Christ the newborn king.
english.segment6: Though an Infant now we view Him, He shall fill His Father's throne, Gather all the nations to Him;. Every knee shall then bow down:
english.segment7: All creation, join in praising. God, the Father, Spirit, Son, Evermore your voices raising. To th'eternal Three in One.
english.segment8: Come and worship, come and worship, Come and worship, Christ the newborn king. Come and worship, come and worship, Come and worship, Christ the newborn king.
